name: magic-bounce

effect.x-y: When this Pokémon is targeted by a move flagged as being reflectable, the move is redirected to its user. All reflectable moves are non-damaging, and most non-damaging moves that target other Pokémon are reflectable. A move reflected by this ability or magic coat cannot be reflected back.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: When this Pokémon is targeted by a move flagged as being reflectable, the move is redirected to its user. All reflectable moves are non-damaging, and most non-damaging moves that target other Pokémon are reflectable. A move reflected by this ability or magic coat cannot be reflected back.

short_effect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.
